Text:
Modern marvels of the History Channel does the story of Nicola Tesla much better also the AC/DC  fight. 
Nicola Tesla wanted high power wireless electricity & built a ginormous 'Tesla'-coil for this in NJ. A giant enterprise and failure. Marconi used 9 Tesla patents for 'inventing' radio. He lit the Chicago world fair which ended Edison's DC system forever.

I have the HD 720p version (way better than the professor on this subject).
